name.description: Specifies the name of the certificate. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the certificate. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

pfx_blob.description: The base64-encoded contents of the certificate. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
pfx_blob.notes: Either `pfx_blob` or `key_vault_secret_id` must be set - but not both.

password.description: The password to access the certificate's private key. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

key_vault_secret_id.description: The ID of the Key Vault secret. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
key_vault_secret_id.notes: If using `key_vault_secret_id`, the WebApp Service Resource Principal ID `abfa0a7c-a6b6-4736-8310-5855508787cd` must have 'Secret -> get' and 'Certificate -> get' permissions on the Key Vault containing the certificate. (Source: [App Service Blog](https://azure.github.io/AppService/2016/05/24/Deploying-Azure-Web-App-Certificate-through-Key-Vault.html)) If you use Terraform to create the access policy you have to specify the Object ID of this Principal. This Object ID can be retrieved via following data reference, since it is different in every AAD Tenant:

friendly_name.description: The friendly name of the certificate.

subject_name.description: The subject name of the certificate.

host_names.description: List of host names the certificate applies to.

issuer.description: The name of the certificate issuer.

issue_date.description: The issue date for the certificate.

expiration_date.description: The expiration date for the certificate.

create.description: Used when creating the App Service Certificate.

update.description: Used when updating the App Service Certificate.

read.description: Used when retrieving the App Service Certificate.

delete.description: Used when deleting the App Service Certificate.
